The following code gives me empty lists, however, if I change * to +, it gives me matching results as expected. import spacy from spacy.attrs import LOWER, IS_PUNCT, IS_SPACE from spacy.matcher import Matcher

pattern = [ {LOWER: "first"}, {IS_PUNCT: True, 'OP': '?'}, {IS_SPACE: True, 'OP': '?'}, #{63: True, 'OP': '+'}, {IS_ANY_TOKEN: True, 'OP': '*'}, {LOWER: ","}, {IS_PUNCT: True, 'OP': '?'}, {IS_SPACE: True, 'OP': '?'}, {LOWER: "third"}, {IS_PUNCT: True, 'OP': '?'}, {IS_SPACE: True, 'OP': '?'} ] matcher.add("ShallMatch", None, pattern)
texts = [ "first second, third", "first second , third", "first second second, third", "first second second , third", "first second second second, third", "first second second second , third", ]
for idx, text in enumerate(texts): doc = en_nlp(text) matches = matcher(doc) print(list(matches)) <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
